name: Datadog Incident Management
description: Obviously I don't work on this by myself - but you (and your cloud-based company) should buy it

name: SearchNEU
description: A project I have worked on as a part of Sandbox, this search engine is an alternative to Northeastern's Banner, with a better UX and faster searches. Built in JavaScript (and now TypeScript) with a PostgreSQL database.

name: HBP Sponsorship Packet
description: This interactive sponsorship packet uses React to make sure that the packet is engaging, informative, and most importantly, interactive. This allows prospective sponsors to fill out the packet and email us a copy. (Please reach out if you're interested in sponsoring HackBeanpot 2021 this February!

name: See more on GitHub!
